page.topic: Using the Stripe API From Xbasic
page.description: The Stripe Genie, accessed from the right-click menu when you are editing Xbasic code, open a genie that shows sample code from making calls to the Stripe API.

discussion.p: The image below shows how the Stripe genie is accessed from the *[ui:Genies...]* menu on the right click menu.

description.p: When you select the *[ui:Stripe genie...]* command the dialog shown below is shown. The genie shows sample Xbasic code for the vast majority of the features exposed by the Stripe API.
